attributes.action: ask Social Services to investigate the fact that Mr and Mrs McCann failed to properly failed to supervise their children in Portugal which led to the disappearance of Madeleine McCann..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the actions of the McCanns should be investigated by Social Services as the actions of the parents led to Madeleine McCann being taken from her hotel room in Portugal. There should be at least some action or comment from Social Services on this matter.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
